text: The Africa Volleyball Championship for Clubs Winner's Cup is an annual international club handball competition run by the African Volleyball Confederation. The cup winners from Africa's national Volleyball leagues are invited to participate in this competition. ==Summary == {| class=wikitable ! Year ! Host ! Champion ! Runner Up !
